籤詩版本二:
Chinjoka cha m’tchire chimapempha kasupe, n’kovuta kwambiri kufunafuna ntchito yolimba.
Nthawi zina, mwadzidzidzi ndimakumana ndi mnzanga wapamtima ndikupita kumwamba ndikugwirana manja.
詩意:
Malo awa a hexagram amafunafuna chithunzi cha kasupe.
Chilichonse chimakhala chovuta chisanakhale chophweka pambuyo pake.
解曰: Zofuna ndi malingaliro. Kumadzulo kulipo. Ndi bwino kusasuntha. Pali malo opezeka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Chen amakumana ndi munthu wosafa
Ku Eastern Han Dynasty, Liu Chen ndi Ruan Zhaoguo anapita kumapiri kukatola zitsamba ndipo anakumana ndi fairies awiri.
Awiriwa anakwatirana ndi nkhokweyo ndipo patatha theka la chaka anabwerera kwawo.
Palibe amene anawazindikira, choncho anabwerera kumapiri kukafunafuna nthanoyo, koma sanaipeze.
聖意: Pempherani madalitso panyumba panu ndi panyumba panu, kuti mupindule nokha, kuti mupindule, kuti mupindule nazo, mupindule nazo, muukwati, mukhale mtendere ndi chitukuko ku Liujia, anthu a ku Chitian, kubzala mbozi za silika koyambirira, kutayika kwa ziweto, kupeza anthu. , chifukwa cha milandu ya anthu, kusamuka, katundu wotayika, matenda, mwayi wabwino m'manda a Xingxing Mountain,
